name: Tech4Care srl
goal:
Tech4Care is composed by a team of professionals with a long experience in home care for frail and dependent people who need continuous assistance and monitoring. Tech4Care provides tailored packages of assistive technologies for independent living, security and monitoring, as well as professional home care and management.
Our motivation is to develop and offer innovative services for older adults, frail and disabled people, exploiting our interdisciplinary competences in various sectors: assistive technologies, domotics, nursing care, biology, epidemiology, social research.
Our commitment is to propose personalised, innovative care solutions at low cost, allowing everybody to benefit in order to improve care, security and independence of frail and dependent people.
Tech4Care is recognised as an innovative start-up (D.L. 179/2012) and spin-out company of the Polytechnic University of Marche in Ancona.
interests: Education and training, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: We are currently participating in several Horizon 2020 Initiatives. Our main interest is in the EU policy for Research & Development and Innovation
